# init(assetTrack:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new mutable video composition layer instruction for the given track.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(assetTrack track: AVAssetTrack)
```

## Parameters

- **track**: The asset track to which to apply the instruction.

## Return Value

A new mutable video composition layer instruction with no transform or opacity ramps and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMutableVideoCompositionLayerInstruction/trackID] initialized to the track ID of `track`.
title: init(assetTrack:)
